job.description: Mobile Developer Androidbr brLOCATIONbrBerkley Heights NJbr brPrimary Requirementbr brullistrongW2 onlystrongliliMinimum 5 years handson software development experience including 3 years writing native Android mobileliliExperience must include experience within past 3 yearsliul brRole Purpose and Contextbr brThe Product Development team is responsible for building and maintaining software for mobile banking Building and maintaining our products includes development of new features and enhancements maintenance and support of existing features technical design and documentation integration deployment and testingbrAs a Software Developer in the Product Development organization you will contribute to all aspects of project delivery with specific focus on the development of new features and enhancements to our productsbrKey RelationshipsbrThis position is part of a team of Developers Business Analysts and Quality Analysts The team receives leadership and guidance from Managers Technical Leads Team Leads Scrum Masters and Product Delivery Managersbr brAdditional Skillsbr brulliSoftware development qualifications preferredliliAn advanced understanding of common computer programming algorithmsliliAn advanced understanding of object orientated design principlesliliA solid understanding of software development patterns and their application in several programming languagesliliAn advanced understanding of coding techniques which contribute to the reliability maintainability readability simplicity performance and testability of softwareliliA solid understanding of IT environments including networking server technologies databases security and performanceliliProficient in the daytoday practicalities of Agile software development methodologies such as Kanban Scrum or the XPliliTertiary qualification in Information Technology or Computer Sciences or relevant work experienceliul
